column1: Kata Robata////A very late review. Dined in october 2019. A little disappointed on the service up front. Called for an omakase reservation and when we arrived
column2: they said they didn't have us down for omakase. And then told us that the omakase chef isn't here on Wednesdays and Sundays
column3: which I wish was mentioned over the phone! My boyfriend and I wanted omakase to celebrate our anniversary
